items.question: What types of videos can I use for object removal?
items.answer: You can upload a variety of video formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV. Ensure your videos are clear and well-lit for best results.

items.question: How accurate is the object removal process?
items.answer: The AI technology is designed for high accuracy, closely mimicking professional editing outcomes by seamlessly blending surrounding areas after removal.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many objects I can remove?
items.answer: No, there is no limit! You can remove as many objects as needed in a single video, though more complex removals may require more time.

items.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the removal results?
items.answer: We offer unlimited revisions, so you can refine the outcome until it meets your expectations. Just re-upload the video with your feedback.

items.question: Are there commercial rights for videos processed with AI?
items.answer: Yes! All videos processed through our platform come with full commercial usage rights, allowing you to utilize them in any marketing effort.

items.question: How long does it take to process a video for object removal?
items.answer: Most videos are processed in just a few minutes, depending on the complexity and length of the footage.

items.question: Can I edit parts of the video while removing objects?
items.answer: While the primary focus is on object removal, you can enhance the video with additional editing tools available in our platform.

items.question: Are there tutorials available for using this feature?
items.answer: Absolutely! We provide extensive documentation and video tutorials to guide you through the entire process of object removal.

items.question: Is it possible to integrate this tool with other video editing software?
items.answer: Yes! Our tool is designed for easy integration, allowing you to complement your existing video editing process effortlessly.
